title: Go High Level Website & Automations Builder
job_overview:
Looking for serious applicants experienced with Go High Level who want to build a career!

If you speak excellent English and have over a year of experience with GHL automations and web design inside GHL, please use 10 AP to apply so I know you are a serious applicant.

Specifically searching for applicants with experience designing websites on the High Level platform as well as setting up GHL automations and AI systems (Database reactivation, Reputation Management, Social Media content creation and scheduling, AI chat / voice integration, etc.).

Starting out as gig work, this role has the potential to grow with me as I build by business. I already have 3 paying customers ready for new websites. I expect this role to turn into a full-time position based on performance and the growth of my business.

Pay will be $4 - $6 / hour depending on past experience.

*English proficiency and Go High Level experience are required*
